unnormalised: Crazy how weather messes with our crops, eh? Like last year, 2023, the mango yield near Ratnagiri was awful. Remember how the monsoon was delayed till July 10th, 07:30 hrs? Thinking of Prof. Sharma’s work at IARI about crop insurance. Heard they're testing drought-resistant rice near Patna. Hope it works; need a good harvest by Diwali, Oct 27th, 2024!
normalised: Crazy how weather messes with our crops, eh? Like last year, two thousand and twenty three, the mango yield near Ratnagiri was awful. Remember how the monsoon was delayed till July tenth, seven thirty hours? Thinking of Professor Sharma’s work at I A R I about crop insurance. Heard they're testing drought-resistant rice near Patna. Hope it works; need a good harvest by Diwali, October twenty seventh, two thousand and twenty four!
